title: Caution: Filling is Hot
description: She's done with men. He's in love again.Piper Frost is embracing her independence after finally shedding her manipulative mooch of a boyfriend. With a new job, in a new city, and new friends, she’s free and loving it until that man crashes her cooking class and upsets everything. Distractingly handsome, his very presence disturbs her in unwelcome ways. She doesn’t need this. Not him. Not now.Contractor Chad Thomas never thought he could fall for another woman after losing his wife five years ago. But Cupid’s arrow had struck again and now this father of two is pulling out all the stops when it comes to convincing Piper it’s time to reconsider her relationship status.Caution: Filling is Hot is a second-chance-at-love contemporary romance. If you enjoy colorful characters, laughter, tender emotion, and hot sex scenes, you’ll adore this entertaining story.Treat yourself to Caution: Filling is Hot today!
author: Tara Mills
